wisheshayenma 1940 anka 9 darana panatha magin purawasthu sorakam kirima sambandha daduwama rupiyal dahasakata nowadi dadayak ho ek warshayakata nowadi sira daduwamakata sima wuwa da sanshodhana nawa panatha magin adala waradi sandaha rupiyal panas dahasaka dadayakata ho awurudu dekakata noadu ha awurudu pahakata nowadi kalayak bandhanagaragatha kirimak ho ihatha daduwam dekama yatath wana se nithi sampadanaya kara atha (1998 anka 24, waganthi 4).

mama sathutu wenawa jaya­wa­rdha­na­pura ma igena gath wishwa widya­laye thakshana widya pitaya mage mathi­wa­rana bala prade­sha­yedi mama usas adhya­pana amathya dhuraya darana kale di jana­dhi­pathi gota­bhaya raja­paksha mahatha athin marthu 16 wanida sisu ayi­thi­yata pawara denna labima gana wishe­sha­yen ma apa katath wada wishala oona­ka­mak athiwa adhya­pana prathi­san­ska­rana sandaha kapa wi sitina jana­dhi­pathi gota­bhaya raja­paksha mahatha athin mema thakshana widya pitaya sisu ayi­thi­yata pawa­ra­di­mata labi­math aithi­ha­sika kara­na­yak yayi ama­thi­wa­raya kiya.
